meaning: to be big, to be large

meanings.en: to be big, to be large

meaning: to be many, to be much

meanings.en: to be many, to be much

examples.english: I have a lot of work
I was disappointed with the result
I'm looking for a new job
I'm going on a business trip next week
I'm very nervous because of the interview
This concept is difficult to understand
I decided to back out of that business

meaning: to read the room, gauge someone's mood (idiom)

meanings.en: to read the room, gauge someone's mood
meanings.es: leer el ambiente, medir el estado de ánimo

examples.english: You need to understand the context
You need to change your way of thinking
I suffered a loss in that deal

examples.korean: 이 단어는 부정적인 함축을 가지고 있어요

examples.english: I want to contribute to social development
We analyzed a vast amount of data
This problem was derived from another problem
You must not overlook important facts

examples.korean: 이 문제에 대한 심층적 고찰이 필요합니다
examples.english: An in-depth contemplation of this issue is needed

meaning: to be attributed to, stem from

meanings.en: to be attributed to, stem from

examples.english: This phenomenon is attributed to environmental change

meaning: to be in accord with, have something in common (idiom)

meanings.en: to be in accord with, have something in common
meanings.es: estar en concordancia, tener algo en común

examples.english: The two theories have something in common

meanings.en: icing on the cake, adding perfection to perfection

examples.english: The good weather was the icing on the cake

meanings.es: lo más destacado, la mejor parte

examples.english: This scene is the highlight of this movie

examples.korean: 많은 언어가 소멸될 위기에 처해 있습니다
examples.english: Many languages are in danger of extinction
He kept silent until the end
We must not neglect this issue

meanings.en: a blessing in disguise, fortune and misfortune are unpredictable

examples.korean: 실패했지만 새옹지마라고, 더 좋은 기회가 왔습니다
examples.english: I failed, but as they say, it was a blessing in disguise - a better opportunity came
My older brother is a university student
My older sister is a teacher
My younger sibling goes to school
I go to school on Monday
I watch a movie on Thursday
I go to church on Sunday
What do you do in the evening?
There are many stars at night
I eat a lot of vegetables

meaning: to wake up, to get up

examples.english: I have to go to the hospital
I withdraw money at the bank
I get off at Seoul Station
I go to the beach in summer
The autumn leaves are pretty in fall
I go to the mountain on weekends
